descriptions:
Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! This chair is designed to provide ultimate comfort and support while you enjoy your gaming or work sessions. 

Here are some of its amazing features:

- Color: Purple
- Material: Premium soft PU leather
- Stitching: Hand-sewing diamond cross stitching for added durability
- Lumbar Pillow: Enjoy a soothing massage with the USB-powered massage function
- Reclining: Adjust the chair angle from 90° to 155° for the perfect lounging position
- Swivel: 360° rotation for easy movement
- Height Adjustable: Customize the chair height to your preference
- Rocking: Rock back and forth up to 15°
- Armrests: Adjustable armrests for vertical and horizontal positioning, covered in soft PU leather
- Frame: Integrated metal frame for stability and durability
- Wheelbase: 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover design with rolling tests of 2000 miles
- Chassis: Thickened explosion-proof chassis for added safety
- Tilt Mechanism: Adjust the chair angle from 90° to 155° with a safety lock feature
- Gas Cylinder: SGS and BIFMA certified for durability
- Weight Capacity: Supports up to 330lbs
- Warranty: Enjoy a one-month free return and 5 years of free parts replacement
- Seat Cushion: 4.3 inches thick high-density shaped foam for great resilience and breathability
- Ergonomics: Retractable footrest, detachable and adjustable headrest, and adjustable lumbar support for added comfort
- Suitable for Gaming and Office use
- Easy Assembly: Comes with instructions and pre-assembled screws for easy setup
- Customer Service: 24/7 support available to ensure a great customer experience

Upgrade your gaming or work setup with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair. Experience the ultimate comfort and support that you deserve.

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! This chair is designed with your comfort and convenience in mind, making it the perfect choice for gaming or working in the office. 

Featuring a stylish purple color and premium soft PU leather material, this chair is not only comfortable but also visually appealing. The hand-sewing diamond cross stitching adds a touch of elegance to its design.

Experience ultimate relaxation with the built-in lumbar pillow, which is USB powered and offers a massage function. You can now unwind and soothe your muscles while sitting in this chair.

The reclining feature allows you to adjust the chair from 90° to 155°, providing you with the perfect angle for gaming or taking a break. The 360° swivel feature allows for easy movement and accessibility.

Stay comfortable during long gaming sessions or work hours with the height adjustable feature. The rocking function adds an extra level of comfort, allowing you to relax and find your optimal position.

The adjustable armrests, coated with soft PU leather, provide support and can be easily adjusted both vertically and horizontally.

Rest assured with the integrated metal frame, ensuring durability and stability. The 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase has been tested for 2000 miles, guaranteeing a safe and reliable chair.

The thickened explosion-proof chassis and adjustable tilt mechanism, with a safety lock, further enhance your safety and provide peace of mind.

The chair is designed to support up to 330lbs, and the gas cylinder is SGS and BIFMA certified, ensuring its durability and longevity.

We understand the importance of a good warranty, which is why we offer a one-month free return and a 5-year parts replacement warranty.

The seat cushion, made of high-density shaped foam with a thickness of 4.3 inches, provides great resilience and breathability for maximum comfort.

The ergonomic support includes a detachable and adjustable headrest and an adjustable lumbar support pillow, allowing you to customize your experience.

This chair is not only suitable for gaming but also perfect for office use. It is easy to assemble with pre-assembled screws and comes with clear instructions.

Our customer service is available 24/7, dedicated to providing you with the best experience possible.

Experience the ultimate in comfort and convenience with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair. Upgrade your gaming or office setup today!

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! This chair is specially designed to provide ultimate comfort and support for all your gaming and office needs. 

Features:
- Color: Purple
- Material: Premium soft PU leather
- Stitching: Hand-sewing diamond cross stitching for added durability and style
- Lumbar Pillow: Enjoy a relaxing massage with the USB-powered massage function
- Reclining: Adjust the chair's angle from 90° to 155° for personalized comfort
- Swivel: Experience complete freedom of movement with the 360° swivel feature
- Height Adjustable: Easily adjust the chair's height to find the perfect position
- Rocking: Rock back and forth with a gentle 15° tilt for relaxation
- Armrests: The adjustable armrests can be moved up and down and right and left for optimal support. Made with soft PU leather coating for added comfort
- Frame: Built with an integrated metal frame for durability and stability
- Wheelbase: Features a 5-point heavy duty anti-rollover design that has undergone rigorous rolling tests for up to 2000 miles
- Chassis: Thickened explosion-proof chassis for added safety
- Tilt Mechanism: The adjustable tilt mechanism allows you to control the chair's angle from 90° to 155°. Safety lock ensures stability
- Gas Cylinder: SGS and BIFMA certified gas cylinder for durability and safety
- Weight Capacity: Supports up to 330lb
- Warranty: Enjoy a one-month free return policy and 5 years of free parts replacement
- Seat Cushion: Made with high density shaped foam for exceptional comfort. Features great resilience and breathability
- Ergonomics: Includes a retractable footrest, detachable and adjustable headrest, and adjustable lumbar support for personalized comfort
- Suitable for gaming and office use
- Easy Assembly: Comes with easy-to-follow instructions and pre-assembled screws for hassle-free setup
- Customer Service: Our customer service is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions or concerns

Experience the ultimate comfort and support with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair. Upgrade your gaming or office setup today!

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! This incredible chair is designed with the needs of gamers and office workers in mind. 

Featuring a stylish purple color and premium soft PU leather material, this chair is not only comfortable but also visually appealing. The hand-sewing diamond cross stitching adds a touch of elegance to its design. 

The chair comes with a variety of features to enhance your comfort and gaming experience. The lumbar pillow, which is USB-powered, provides soothing massages. You can easily adjust the chair's angle, ranging from 90° to 155°, to find the perfect position for gaming or working. The chair also swivels 360°, allowing for easy movement. 

With adjustable armrests that can be moved both vertically and horizontally, you can customize the chair to your liking. The armrests are made of soft PU leather for added comfort. 

The chair's frame is made of integrated metal, ensuring durability and stability. The 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase has undergone rigorous rolling tests of 2000 miles, guaranteeing smooth and safe movement. The chassis is thickened and explosion-proof for your peace of mind. 

The tilt mechanism can be adjusted from 90° to 155° and has a safety lock feature. The gas cylinder is SGS and BIFMA certificated, ensuring its quality and durability. The chair has a weight capacity of up to 330lbs, making it suitable for users of different sizes. 

We offer a generous warranty, including a one-month free return policy and 5 years of free parts replacement. 

The seat cushion is made of high-density shaped foam, providing great resilience and breathability. The footrest is retractable for added comfort, and the headrest is detachable and adjustable to suit your preferences. The lumbar support pillow is also adjustable for personalized comfort. 

This chair is perfect for gaming or office use and is easy to assemble with included instructions and pre-assembled screws. Our customer service is available 24/7, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free experience.

Featuring a stylish purple color and premium soft PU leather material, this chair is not only comfortable but also visually appealing. The hand-sewn diamond cross stitching adds a touch of elegance and durability to the design. 

The Darkecho Gaming Office Chair is packed with amazing features that will enhance your sitting experience. The lumbar pillow comes with a USB-powered massage function, providing soothing relief to your lower back. The chair also offers a wide range of reclining positions, from 90° to 155°, allowing you to find the perfect angle for relaxation or intense gaming sessions. With a 360° swivel, you can easily move around without any hassle.

The chair is height adjustable and comes with a rocking feature of 15°, giving you the flexibility to customize your sitting position. The armrests are adjustable both vertically and horizontally, providing optimal support for your arms and wrists. Made with soft PU leather, they offer a comfortable resting place for your arms.

Built with an integrated metal frame and a thickened explosion-proof chassis, this chair ensures stability and safety. The 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase has passed rigorous rolling tests of 2000 miles, ensuring smooth and reliable movement. With an SGS and BIFMA certificated gas cylinder, this chair can support a weight capacity of up to 330lbs. The Darkecho Gaming Office Chair is suitable for both gaming enthusiasts and office professionals. It is easy to assemble with pre-assembled screws and comes with clear instructions. Our customer service is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions or concerns.
